full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , *, ,DKAR ZA'I MCHOD PA DANG, TSE THAR BRTEN 'BUL BSANGS MA nI RIL BU 'BUL BA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYA'O, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA DE MCHED 'GROGS AEM CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PA'I @008B BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I SOG YIG TSIG LHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MOD, RANG RANG LA LHA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR SBYIN BSREG GI THAB BSKYED PA DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS, RAB BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG MCHOD 'BUL BA LA SOGS NI, NOM CHE KO'U SHRI BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS PA, ,BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
